attributes.action: Launch a police investigation into the use of UK taxpayer pounds, by David Cameron, to fund international terrorism.
attributes.additional_details: It has been revealed by Transparency International that David Cameron is using the UK Foreign Aid Fund as a front to channel secret funding to support international terrorism by corrupt regimes across the planet.  Some of the countries receiving this secret funding in the form of 'Foreign Aid' payments are known to be actively working to damage the global interests and security of the United Kingdom.  There MUST be a police investigation.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter.
